amazon_bedrock.description: Does your company have an AWS contract?
api_key_steps: Go to https://us-west-2.console.aws.amazon.com/bedrock/home?region=us-west-2#/overview - make sure to select us-west-2 region as it has the most models and Kiln defaults to this region
Request access to supported models like Llama and Mistral
Use this guide to create IAM keys https://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/id_credentials_access-keys.html and make sure to select 'AmazonBedrockFullAccess' policy when creating the IAM user
Get the new user's Access Key ID and Secret Access Key. Paste them below and click 'Connect'
